scripts.package: sam package --template-file ./pipeline.yaml --s3-bucket khel-test-pipeline --output-template-file packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --profile nevinedwin
scripts.postdeploy: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --region ap-south-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --stack-name khel-test-pipeline --s3-bucket khel-test-pipeline --parameter-overrides PipelineBucket=khel-test-pipeline ProjectName=khelApp-stack-local --profile=nevinedwin
